# mysql_role (Resource)

MySQL role

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "mysql_role" "app" {
  name = "app-role"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the role

### Optional

- `host` (String) The source host of the role. Defaults to `%`

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The identifier
